Attacks.Name: Ice Shard
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Alolan Sandshrew gains power equal to the damage dealt. Wild: The target gains the Slow special condition.

Attacks.Name: Metal Claw
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled, Alolan Sandshrew gains 1 power after the attack is resolved.

Superpowers.Name: Snow Cloak
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters targeting Alolan Sandshrew with attacks suffer -1 attack die if they are within Range 3.

Superpowers.Name: Iron Defense
Superpowers.Effect: Until the start of its next activation, Alolan Sandshrew adds 1 die to its defense rolls.

Attacks.Name: Blizzard
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, enemy characters within Range 2 of the target suffer 1 damage and gain the Slow special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Avalanche
Superpowers.Effect: Enemy characters within Range 2 of Alolan Sandshrew suffer 1 damage. Alolan Sandshrew gains 1 power for each character damaged this way.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Alolan Sandslash character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
